<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="x_lego_script"> <x_lego_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>Use this for Lab 2's UI action as instructed</description> <name>Lab 2 - UI Action</name> <script><![CDATA[var evaluator = new GlideScopedEvaluator();
var userTasks = new MyUtils().taskCounter(current.user); evaluator.putVariable('taskCount', userTasks);
evaluator.evaluateScript(current, 'script'); action.setRedirectURL(current);]]></script> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2016-04-08 20:03:11</sys_created_on> <sys_id>ef26aca367221200dfe55bb557415ac2</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2016-04-08 20:03:11</sys_updated_on> </x_lego_script> </record_update>
